company_description: - Unifun is a team of 300 professionals who develop IT products for Mobile Operators - Currently, we are working with 95 Mobile Operators in 60 countries around the world - Founded in 2005 in Moldova (headquarters), today we have offices in 14 countries
job_description: Creating and updating Unifun products presentation in PowerPoint: - static presentations – are sent to clients (Mobile Operators) for remote analyzing of detailed product information - animated presentations – are used by Unifun employees to present our products during live meetings with clients Creating and updating Unifun products presentation in PowerPoint: - internal sources: product and technical descriptions, user guides, etc. (documents prepared by other Unifun departments) - external sources: web research of competitors docs on similar products – to find new marketing ideas for our presentations Creating an easy to read and logically structured text content Making tasks to designers to create visual components: icons and illustrations (for particular slides) Final formatting of the presentation

company_description: Angajăm:
job_description: 1. Să aibă o atitudine pozitivă. 2. Să fie dispus să învețe. Dacă nu învață, nu crește nici angajatul, nici Compania. 3. Să se îmbrace frumos, da, imaginea lui transmite imaginea firmei. 4. Să fie organizat, disciplinat. 5. Să fie altruist. Lenevia nu are ce căuta la noi în firmă! 6. Sa cunoasca programul Auto CAD, 2D. 7. Să știe să vorbească respectuos și coerent. 8. Să posede limba romană si rusă. 9. Să detina cunostinte tehnice si de proiectare.10. Se accepta proaspăt absolvent, student cu frecvență redusă sau masterand. Nu contează virsta, doar atitudinea!
